msbt.message: Well, hello there! Thank you for coming to celebrate my birthday!
If it isn't , live and in person. This is going to be so much fun!
Welcome! Thank you so much for coming today.It's my birthday, but that doesn't mean you get to find out how old I am, .

You know what I love about birthdays? Because it's certainly not the prospect of getting older. No, there's just something magical about the way the candles light up the cake and everyone's faces And, well, I'm not one to turn my nose up at a gift, if you catch my drift, .
Well, in that case...
I can't help with that.

When everyone gathers to celebrate my birthday like this, it makes me the happiest in the world! And when some are even kind enough to bring me giftswell, it takes it to a whole new level! If I may be so bold, did yoooou bring me a present?
Here, this is for you.
Er, sorry...

Oh, hasn't this been just the most lovely party?No, I don't think I'll ever get tired of birthday cake and lovingly selected gifts. Oh! There does seem to be a slight deficit regarding the latter of those two things
I got you something.
Sorry, I forgot.
Oh, please. That's perfectly alright. Though I'll be sure to remember this no-gift policy at YOUR birthday
Oh, don't worry your pretty little head about it.Just having you here is all the gift I need. Despite how desperately I could use a new
Oh, I'm sure you just forgot it at home. That's no problem! You could drop it off anytime. More importantly, you're here with me to celebrate my special day. Let's enjoy this party!
Hold the phonehave we met? I don't believe we have!Well, I'm , and this is my birthday party!I've already opened a lot of really nice presents, but making a new friend is a pretty good gift too!
Forgot it at home, did we?
What a lovely wrapping job you've done here! Now, what could be inside this gorgeous package
Ooh, the wrapping on this is tr√©s chic. Hope you don't mind me tearing into it!
This is the best part of the whole thing. The sheer anticipation! Ooh, what's inside?
Oh, ! It's a wonderful little cake! How thoughtful of you.After all, you can't have a birthday party without a birthday cake. It's right there in the name!
Oohthis IS a bit awkward.I suppose you couldn't have known that I have already. Well, it's the thought that counts. And I honestly wouldn't mind having 10 of these!
Oh mywhat a funny coincidence! I'm wearing the very same ! Well, let's look on the bright side. You DO know what I like.
Oh, this is fabulous! I do love a good .Hold the phone It does seem oddly familiarTell me, , where did you EVER find the inspiration to put together an outfit like this?
Are you serious? You're GIVING me ?Goodness, I'm so happy! I don't understand how you can be so generous, but I'm very glad you are!
Wait, is this some sort of mistake? You're actually going to give me ? Well, I don't know what I did to deserve it, but I can promise you that I'll cherish it forever. Thank you!
Ooh, I always appreciate a nice . Thanks!
Well, this is a pleasant surprise! I'm always happy to get !
!What a perfectly thoughtful gift.
How sweet! It's so YOU to give to me, .
Oh dear I'm sorry, but I can't accept this. No offense, but it's a bit gauche to offer currency as a gift
What is the meaning of this? Is this your idea of a joke?Well, I don't think it's funny. I'm not your recycling bin. Take this back and get out of my sight.
That's one I've never seen before. Did you really just give me turnips, darling? Well, I'm not one to let a present go to waste. I'll just have to eat them before they rot.
!Thank you, . I'm sure it will be delicious.

Oh my Could this really be a DIY recipe?<10_4 /> Oh, darling, I'm delighted, but You're far too kind. Indeed, when I think of how much this might mean to you, I simply can't accept it. You being here is more than enough of a birthday present for me. So let me give this back, .

Why, is this for me? I hope I didn't come off as demanding.I know it's a bit unusual for the birthday celebrant to give a gift in return, but I'm feeling generous. From me to you, darling. . Do enjoy!
Receiving a birthday present from ‚Äîwhat a delightful surprise!Now, please allow me to share the feeling with a little gift from me to you. Surely you can't say no to !
I'm so pleased with the gift you gave me, I just had to thank you one more time. Sothank you!
Thanks so much for making today special. You're a great friend!
I just wanted to say this one more timethank you so much for the thoughtful gift. It means a lot.
I'm always a bit tickled to find out that I have the same birthday as a celebrity And I can only imagine how they feel when they find out about me, !
I'm taking notes and working on plans for next year's party already.I'll be a year older, so I need to host an even bigger blowout, !

Every year on my birthday, I spend a little time writing down my goals for the following year. I read in a magazine that writing goals down can help you actually realize them. Last year my goal was to write down my goals this year, so I'm one-for-one, !
It's just so magical to have everyone here celebrating me How can I possibly express my gratitude?
Every year I tell myself that I'm not going to cryBut h-having everyone c-c-celebrate my b-birthday just makes me so h-h-happyyyyy!
I confess, In my heart of hearts, I was hoping for a present from you.
I've got it right here!
Oh, sorry...
Today has been a truly fabulous day. Of course, a present from you would make it perfect. Really, though You did bring me one, didn't you?
I did!
Sorry, I didn't...
This party has had a little bit of everything so far. Well, almost everything, I should say If a certain someone was thinking of giving another certain someone a certain something, the time is now
Here's a gift for you!
Sorry.
Leaving already? Well, I suppose the fun can't go on forever.I really liked the gift you brought me. Stop by anytime, OK?
Oh, I suppose it's that time, huh?Well, thank you so much for stopping by. I really appreciate the gift you brought me. See you soon, I hope!
All good things must come to an end, hm? Well, I'm thrilled that you were able to come visit. And I can't thank you enough for the gift. It's so thoughtful! Let's meet up again soon, OK?
Oh, leaving already? <10_4 />Well, I suppose it's about that time. Glad you could make it!
Now, now. You can't leave before I thank you for coming!Sothank you! I'm really glad that you could make it. Do come over again sometime soon!
Oh, are you leaving, then? Well, thank you again for dropping by. I've had a fabulous birthday!
Oh! ! It's simply splendid that you're here now. You see, today is my birthday.We simply must celebrate together. You can be my birthday surprise AND my guest of honor!

Why, ! How lovely! I can't believe you're here, ! You know, I moved to this island and, believe it or not, there is a little celebration for me today. It IS my birthday after all. And do you know what the perfect birthday gift would be? YOU celebrating with ME.

Why, it's a pleasure to meet you! Welcome to my birthday party!Oh, it's no big thing. Just everyone on the island is celebrating little ol' me today. Having an unexpected guest is quite the honor, . You really MUST come celebrate with us!

I'm just pleased to have you here but you even brought a present! It's all so very touching! Now, I'd like to give YOU a present as well, but your pockets are full. I simply can't ask you to carry more. So, before you leave the island, see if you can't make some room and then come see me again. I'll give you your little prezzie then, .
Oh, you came back! Well then, just as I said before, please accept this teensy token of my gratitude. is all, nothing fancy. I just hope you don't mind the extra baggage.

Oh, hello, ! I have a fun piece of trivia for youDid you know that I share a birthday with ? What ARE the odds?! Well, we decided that we couldn't waste the opportunity, so it's a double party! With double the fun! Goodness, I can't help but wonder does the look on your face mean you have a birthday present for me?
I do, indeed!
I'm sorry, I don't.
